expertSection.title: Recommended by Psychologists
expertSection.subtitle: Our videos are developed based on psychological principles that promote healthy development of children's self-esteem.

testimonial.paragraph1: In the videos, children are treated with genuine respect and importance. Santa Claus speaks to them respectfully and shows that he knows a lot about their achievements and attitudes that need improvement.
testimonial.paragraph2: This personalized attention makes children feel truly important and noticed. Recognizing and reflecting on their efforts is essential for them to value themselves, which later contributes to a healthy sense of self-esteem.
testimonial.paragraph3: Santa Claus praises indirectly, saying things like 'you can be proud of yourself,' which helps children develop internal motivation.
testimonial.paragraph4: I like the videos, not only for the joy they bring to children and the memories they create for families. They also contribute to the child's development by making them feel seen and accepted as they are, which can increase their confidence. I highly recommend them!
